Header: New Kitchen Complex for the Other Ranks’ Mess Opened
Content: A newly-constructed modern Kitchen Complex for Other Ranks’ Mess at Security Force Headquarters – Jaffna (SFHQ-J) was opened by the Commander Security Forces - Jaffna, Major General Dharshana Hettiarrachchi on Saturday (6). The new kitchen is fully equipped with all modern equipment to provide a better service and quality food for the Other Ranks who are serving in the SFHQ –J.
